general_advisory: To control foot rot disease in paddy spray Metalaxyl 8% + Mancozeb 64% WP @ 400 gram/acre. Harvest matured crops like vegetables & pulses and keep them in a safe place. Deworming and vaccination against Foot and Mouth Disease and Brucellosis should be advised in animals. Vegetable seedlings should be transplanted in afternoon hours.

advisory: False smut disease may be seen in paddy field. To manage the same, spray Propiconazole or Hexaconazole @ 100 ml or Copper oxychloride @ 250 g in 200 lt of water per acre.
Neck Blast diseases first drain out excess water from the paddy field. Spray Hexaconazole ml/acre or Azoxystrobin+ Difenoconazole @ 200 ml/acre.
Top dressing of fertilizer is going on. Harvesting of maize crop has started.

Pod Borer Management - There are chances of Pod borer infestation in black gram and green gram crop. To manage Bihar hairy caterpillar in green gram and black gram crop spray Emamectin Benzoate 5% SG @ 80 ml/acre or Profenophos 50% EC @ 400 ml/acre.
Pod Borer Management - There are chances of Pod borer infestation in black gram and green gram crop.
Before sowing of seeds seed treatment should be done with Carbendazim 50% WP @ 2 grams or Carboxin 37.5% + Thiram 37.5% D.S @ 3 grams/kg of seeds.
To manage the infestation of Fruit flies, spray Malathion @ 1 ml/lt.
To reduce the Phomopsis blight disease in brinjal, spray Metalaxyl + Mancozeb Zineb 75% WP @ 500 g/acre in 200 litres of water.
